pages.md:
# BUTTON/DIAL SETTING

Access options for camera controls.

To access control options, press **MENU/OK**, select the !SET UP tab, and choose **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING**.

!Button/Dial Setting Menu

## FOCUS LEVER SETTING

Choose the functions performed by the focus stick (focus lever).

| Option           | Description                                                                 |
|------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| LOCK (OFF)       | The focus stick cannot be used during shooting.                             |
| PUSH â¬¤ TO UNLOCK | Press the stick to view the focus-point display and tilt the stick to select a focus point. |
| ON               | Tilt the stick to view the focus-point display and select a focus point.    |

## EDIT/SAVE QUICK MENU

Choose the items displayed in the quick menu during still photography (ðŸ“– 379).

## EDIT/SAVE QUICK MENU

Choose the items displayed in the quick menu when filming movies (ðŸ“– 379).
